description: A user resource representing a registered user of the portal. Personal details of the user, such as e-mail and groups, are returned only to the user or the administrator of the user's organization (the properties in the Response Properties table below). A user is not visible to any other user (except the organization's administrator) if their access setting is set to private. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/User/02r3000000m2000000/
title: user

username.description: The username of the given user

preferredView.description: The user's preferred view for content, either web or GIS

idpUsername.description: The original username if using enterprise logins

favGroupId.description: The user's favorites group and is created automatically for each user

lastLogin.description: The last login date of the user

access.description: Indicates the level of access of the user: private, org, or public. If private, the user descriptive information will not be available to others nor will the username be searchable

storageusage.description: The amount of storage used for the user's subscription

storageQuota.description: Applicable to public users as it sets the total amount of storage available for a subscription. The maximum quota is 2GB

orgId.description: The ID of the organization the user belongs to

role.description: Defines the user's role in the organization: administrator (org_admin), publisher (org_publisher), information worker (org_user), or custom (<custom_role_name>)

disabled.description: Disables access to the organization by the user

tags.description: User-defined tags that describe the user

culture.description: The item locale information (language and country)

region.description: The user preferred region, used to set the featured maps on the home page, content in the gallery, and the default extent of new maps in the Viewer

thumbnail.description: The file name of the thumbnail used for the user. All user thumbnails are relative to the URL http://<community-url>/users/<userName>/info

created.description: The date the user was created. Shown in UNIX time

modified.description: The date the user was last modified. Shown in UNIX time

groups.description: A JSON array of groups the user belongs to. See Group for properties of a group

provider.description: The identity provider for the organization. Either arcgis (for built-in users) or enterprise (for external users managed by an enterprise identity store). This was added at Portal for ArcGIS 10.3.1

getGroup.description: The Group resource represents a group within the portal. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Group/02r30000006m000000/
getGroup.title: group

title.description: The title of the group. This is the name that is displayed to users and by which they refer to the group. Every group must have a title, and it must be unique for a user.

isInvitationOnly.description: If this is set to true, users will not be able to apply to join the group

owner.description: The owner username of the group

tags.description: User-defined tags that describe the group

phone.description: The contact information for the group

sortOrder.description: The sort order, either descending or ascending

isViewOnly.description: Boolean value indicating whether the results are only for viewing

isFav.description: Boolean value indicating whether marked in favorites

thumbnail.description: The URL to the thumbnail used for the group. All group thumbnails are relative to the URL: http://<community-url>/groups/<groupId>/info

created.description: The date the group was created. Shown in UNIX time in milliseconds

modified.description: The date the group was last modified. Shown in UNIX time in milliseconds

access.description: The access privileges of the group that determine who can see and access the group. Can be: private, org, or public

userMembership.description: If the request is made by an authenticated user, a JSON object is returned containing information about the user's access to the group. This includes the username of the calling user, the memberType, which specifies the type of membership the user has in the group (owner, member, admin, none), and the applications (number of requests to join the group) count available to admins and owners

memberType.description: Specifies the type of membership the user has in the group (owner, member, admin, none)

applications.description: Number of requests to join the group available to admins and owners.
